title: Gravel Racing’s New Price Tag: Is Prize Money Changing the Spirit of the Sport?
content:
For the most part, pro riders and event organizers think that purses should be the new norm. As for the spirit of gravel? 'It died a long time ago.'

Read the full article at Gravel Racing’s New Price Tag: Is Prize Money Changing the Spirit of the Sport? on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
